document.title: SP681-U-Do You Have What It Takes to Deal With Debt?

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Buy now! Pay later! It may be very tempting to use a credit card or get a loan to purchase something you want today so you donâ€™t have to wait until you have the cash to pay for it. Credit can be good, but it can also be bad if you get into debt over your head. Use this fact sheet t to see whether you can deal with debt.
